data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains five *.rti files of the specimen MNHN RI 428 of Donrussellia provincialis in different orientation views (dorsal, lateral, medial, plantar and posterior).This specimen has been described and analyzed in the associated paper "Postcrania of the most primitive euprimate and implications for primate origins". This right talus is the first discovery of non-dental skeletal material of Donrussellia provincialis, the most primitive fossil species belonging to the order Euprimates at present time.These RTI files enable a visualisation of the specimen in a high resolution photographic quality, for five orientations, with interactive re-lighting capturing surface, shape and color.
